name: tinder date in the belly of a long-dead god
name_original: tinder date in the belly of a long-dead god
description:
hey, i made a bitsy game to work through some stuff! it's about dating and trauma and being queer and how to value yourself and the people around you when it feels like nobody else assigns much value at all to you. it might not be smart or fun, but it is kind of sad and gay.

i would be remiss not to credit visager's bitsy moment "flirting" as an inspiration for this thing.

made in Bitsy, all stuff by dee warrick

be kind and build community
